short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force a forground text colour of off-white and a background colour of off-black.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses a CSS rule to force a foreground text colour of off-white and a background colour of off-black to make light mode pages dark mode. This improves accessibility for people who struggle to read black text on white.
